description: Try our easy to follow Hearty Beef Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stew & casserole,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free
name: Hearty Beef Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spray pan with canola oil and heat, add beef and cook until brown.
Add carrots and MasterfoodsÂ® Hearty Beef Casserole Simmer Sauce 495g and simmer uncovered for five minutes or until vegetables are soft and the sauce is heated through.
Serve with rice (cooked as per instructions on pack) or mashed potato.
